name: squeue
description: squeue is used to view job and job step information for jobs managed by SLURM..

parameterdefs.name: accounts
parameterdefs.description: Specify the accounts of the jobs to view. Accepts a comma separated list of account names.

parameterdefs.name: all
parameterdefs.description: Submit  the  batch  script  to  the SLURM controller immediately, like normal, but tell the controller to defer the allocation of the job until the specified time.

parameterdefs.name: array
parameterdefs.description: Display one job array element per line. Without this option, the display will be optimized for use with job arrays (pending job array elements will be combined on one line of output with the array index values printed using a regular expression).

parameterdefs.name: noheader
parameterdefs.description: Do not print a header on the output

parameterdefs.name: help
parameterdefs.description: Print a help message describing all options squeue.

parameterdefs.name: hide
parameterdefs.description: Do not display information about jobs and job steps in all partitions.

parameterdefs.name: iterate
parameterdefs.description: Repeatedly gather and report the requested information at the interval specified (in seconds). By default, prints a time stamp with the header.

parameterdefs.name: jobs
parameterdefs.description: Requests a comma separated list of job IDs to display. Defaults to all jobs.

parameterdefs.name: long
parameterdefs.description: Report more of the available information for the selected jobs or job steps, subject to any constraints specified.

parameterdefs.name: licenses
parameterdefs.description: Request jobs requesting or using one or more of the named licenses.

parameterdefs.name: clusters
parameterdefs.description: Clusters to issue commands to. Multiple cluster names may be comma separated. A value of of 'all' will query to run on all clusters.

parameterdefs.name: name
parameterdefs.description: Request jobs or job steps having one of the specified names. The list consists of a comma separated list of job names.

parameterdefs.name: format
parameterdefs.description: Specify the information to be displayed, its size and position (right or left justified). Also see the -O <output_format>, --Format=<output_format> option described below (which supports less flexibility in formatting, but supports access to all fields).

parameterdefs.name: Format
parameterdefs.description: Specify the information to be displayed. Also see the -o <output_format>, --format=<output_format> option described below (which supports greater flexibility in formatting, but does not support access to all fields because we ran out of letters). Requests a comma separated list of job information to be displayed.

parameterdefs.name: partition
parameterdefs.description: Specify the partitions of the jobs or steps to view. Accepts a comma separated list of partition names.

parameterdefs.name: priority
parameterdefs.description: For pending jobs submitted to multiple partitions, list the job once per partition.

parameterdefs.name: qos
parameterdefs.description: Specify the qos(s) of the jobs or steps to view. Accepts a comma separated list of qos's.

parameterdefs.name: reservation
parameterdefs.description: Specify the reservation of the jobs to view.

parameterdefs.name: steps
parameterdefs.description: Specify the job steps to view. This flag indicates that a comma separated list of job steps to view follows without an equal sign (see examples). The job step format is 'job_id[_array_id].step_id'. Defaults to all job steps. Since this option's argument is optional, for proper parsing the single letter option must be followed immediately with the value and not include a space between them.

parameterdefs.name: sort
parameterdefs.description: Specification of the order in which records should be reported. This uses the same field specification as the <output_format>. Multiple sorts may be performed by listing multiple sort fields separated by commas.

parameterdefs.name: start
parameterdefs.description: Report the expected start time and resources to be allocated for pending jobs in order of increasing start time.

parameterdefs.name: states
parameterdefs.description: Specify the states of jobs to view. Accepts a comma separated list of state names or 'all'. If 'all' is specified then jobs of all states will be reported.

parameterdefs.name: user
parameterdefs.description: Request jobs or job steps from a comma separated list of users.

parameterdefs.name: usage
parameterdefs.description: Print a brief help message listing the squeue options.

parameterdefs.name: verbose
parameterdefs.description: Report details of squeues actions.

parameterdefs.name: version
parameterdefs.description: Display version information and exit.

parameterdefs.name: nodelist
parameterdefs.description: Report only on jobs allocated to the specified node or list of nodes.
